scripts.dev: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:less
scripts.build: gulp clear-build && gulp less && gulp less-lp && node build.js  && gulp render-fm && gulp build-html-preview && gulp build-pt-preview && gulp render-nofm && gulp build-html && gulp build-pt
scripts.build-g: gulp clear-build && gulp less && gulp less-lp && node build.js  && gulp render-nofm && gulp build-html && gulp build-pt
scripts.build-amp: gulp clear-build && gulp less && node build.js && gulp render-amp && gulp build-amp-preview && gulp render-amp-nofm && gulp build-amp
